author: th0masc0nn0lly50
title: room and near to all places to go to
text:
rooms were fine for us shower and bathroom again fine and for being next to nearly all the places you would want to go to 5 out of 5 .rooms cleaned every day and if we need anything they be there with in a few mins . the room is not massive but as we only spent time sleeping them its up any one ally. price ok and if you look around then you see how good the location is and for the price then its spot on
Room Tip: room is all you need .its in a great place to all attraction See more room tips
